summary: Schema mismatches detected: 2 tables have column mismatches

details.summary: Schema mismatches detected: 2 tables have column mismatches

formatted_report:
⚠️ Schema mismatches detected: 2 tables have column mismatches

🔧 Tables with column mismatches:
   📊 Table: crop_plans
      🔴 In DATABASE but NOT in migrations: test_extra_column
         → These columns exist in your database but are not defined in any migration
         → Action: Create a migration to add these columns OR manually drop them from database

   📊 Table: orders
      🟡 In MIGRATIONS but NOT in database: created_at
         → These columns are defined in migrations but don't exist in your database
         → Action: Run 'php artisan migrate' OR the column was manually dropped

💡 Impact on Backups:
   • Full backups: Will include the extra columns (no issues)
   • Data-only backups: Will fail to restore if schema changes
   • Full backups: Will work fine (includes current schema)
   • Data-only backups: May fail - backup expects columns that don't exist
